pages.text: The Building Gadget is a special tool that magically places blocks in whatever way you want. Shift-click a block in the world to select a block to build with, and press $(bold)$(k:key.buildinggadgets.settings_menu)$() to open the Gadget menu. $(br2)Gadgets can be charged in Energy Cubes.
The Exchanging gadget is like the Building Gadget, except it replaces existing blocks. It is used in the same way.
Construction Paste is made by placing Construction Block Powder next to water, like concrete. Putting Construction Paste in a Container will allow the Gadgets to create "fake" blocks.
